name: Get Big (dingofar)
description:
GET BIG! (Kenney Game Jam 2022  - Theme: Growth)

Find all 10 food items and eat them and grow bigger!

- Game is playable but not near complete -

Gamepad not required but controls 100% better than Keyboard and Mouse.

Find and eat all 10 food items to "win"

-Original Idea-

3D platformer where you need to find all 10 food items. The catch would be that every 3rd item would make you grow. Because of the level layout only certain items would be accessible to small/medium/large size player. If you don't get the items in the correct order you might lock yourself out of getting all 10 to 100% the board. The level would be timed as well to give a replay ability. 

-Credits-

Engine: Unity

Programming: Me

Art :Kenney (Kenney)

Music Music: Good Morning Doctor Weird - Eric Matyas (SoundImage)

Jump SFX: Swing Whoosh - Jofae (PixaBay)

Chew SFX: Chew - 666HeroHero (PixaBay)
